title: Watch BOARDS
summary: For Magician artistsUse with Mini,Medium & Maxi BOARDS and Android Wear Watches
developerAddress:
SYSTEMIC PRODUCTIONS
90 rue de Paris
77200 Torcy
FRANCE
description: This application is destined to magician artists and allows to receive written texts and drawings through Bluetooth transmission from a mobile electronic tactile slate called "Psychic Miniboard", "Psychic Mediumboard" or "Psychic Maxiboard". You will be able to display incoming images directly on your cell phone and Android Wear compatible watch.This application is the perfect tool for any magician desiring to do unrehearsed Mentalism in a Close-up condition with his audience and in any type of place.
descriptionHTML:
This application is destined to magician artists and allows to receive written texts and drawings through Bluetooth transmission from a mobile electronic tactile slate called "Psychic Miniboard", "Psychic Mediumboard" or "Psychic Maxiboard". You will be able to display incoming images directly on your cell phone and Android Wear compatible watch.

This application is the perfect tool for any magician desiring to do unrehearsed Mentalism in a Close-up condition with his audience and in any type of place.
recentChanges: Permits to use the app with new Samsung models like J5, S6, S6+, S7 and beyond.
